title: change password problem
body:
im having a problem with a hacker that will log on my account and spam "hey, have you heard of elitesmurfs.com?" to everyone in my friends list. im sick and tired of getting constantly logged out and im unable to change my password because i no longer can get into my yahoo email. all of my info is old/incorrect and forces me into a loop. is there any way i can work around this?

 please help

replies.body:
You can request a change to your email if you write in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). One of our account specialists will work with you to resolve this.

Let me know if you have any questions.
